definition[0]: if a dog wags its tail, or if its tail wags, the dog moves its tail many times from one side to the other
definition[1]: to move your finger or head from side to side, especially to show disapproval
example[0]: ‘You naughty girl!’ Mom said, wagging her finger at me.
definition[2]: someone who says or does something clever and amusing
example[1]: Some wag had drawn a face on the wall.
definition[4]: the wife or girlfriend of a famous sports player
example[2]: Are WAGs good role models for girls?
